description: SAP Process Integration (PGP Module - Business-to-Business Add On), version - 1.0, allows an attacker to read PGP Keys under certain conditions in the PGP Module of Business-to-Business Add-On, these keys can then be used to read messages processed by the module leading to Information Disclosure.

product.name: SAP Process Integration (PGP - Module Business-to-Business Add On)
